title: HELP! I Need Help Finding Out the Name of This Font
tags: Any idea what this font is?
content:
I need to change a jpeg a client sent us into a vector but they never mentioned which font was being used for the text. Is there anyone who can help me find out which font this is? I've tried several font identification websites with no luck. Please see the attached image. Thank you all!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/INPAC_lower%20text_4897.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [INPAC\_lower text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013228/http:/typophile.com/files/INPAC_lower%20text.jpg) | 654.37 KB |
author: Nettles4349

comments.content:
First you need to post it here:

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013228/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
Thank you! I'm new to this forum and didn't realize there was a separate section dedicated to font identification.
